body.name: Spring Colorful Floral Lumbar Pillow Covers 12x20 Set of 2, Easter Gnome Bunny Flower Pillow Covers 12 x 20, Farmhouse Easter Spring Outdoor Decor for Corch Pouch and Patio Furniture
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Adorable Pop of Color 】 Charming Spring Gnomes & Easter Bunny pattern printed lumbar pillow without inserts. Lovely watercolor spring elements add a splash of color to indoor homes and outdoor porches.

【No Pillow Insert or Filler Included】 A set of 2 easter lumbar pillow covers in beige. Without any pillow inserts or fillers. Use soft inserts and they will become the designated napping pillow for the household.

【Quality Fabric】 Made of durable polyester & linen blended fabric, it feels like a soft burlap to the touch and won't hurt your skin. It is more suitable for decoration than as bedding. No colour fading, No bad smell.

【Invisible Zipper】 Set of 2 spring lumbar pillow covers 12 x 20 inch, simple and warm. The zipper at the bottom of the vintage pillow cover is convenient for stuffing the pillow insert while not affecting the aesthetics.

【Good Workmanship】The polyester fabric is reinforced with stitched edges on the inside and at the end of the zipper. However, since the fabric is hand cut, please allow 0.2-0.5 inches of size error. It does not affect normal use.
body.description: Great addition for indoor & outdoor spring decorOur gnomes and bunny Spring Easter throw pillow covers can help you change room's style in a moment. This Spring holiday throw pillow cover will refresh your room, easily matches with other Spring Easter home decor.SIZE12x20 / 18x18 inches, Due to manual cutting and sewing, please allow some deviation in size.WASHING GUIDANCEHand washing or Machine Wash Cold Separately, Gently Cycle Only, No Bleach, Tumble Dry, Do Not Iron.TIPS1. Pillow Covers Only. (No inserts or fillers)2. Hidden zipper closure, single-sided print, back and background is all beige.3. Please fold the pillow core in half and insert it slowly into pillow cover when replacing.APPLICATIONSuitable for indoor & outdoor use, such as sofa, car, couch, office, patio, porch and bedroom etc.Good To Know Before You Buy:1. The real color of the item may be slightly different from the pictures shown on websitecaused by many factors such as brightness of your monitor and light brightness.2.All the measurement are handmade, there may be about 0.5 inch deviation.Package Included: Set of 2 Spring Farmhouse Pillow Covers

reviews.reviewText: Washed and dryed in dryer. Every fiber stays intact. Color does not fade. Fits small sqishable pillows.
